status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
Hello!

Please use a more recent version of Ti Studio. 

The fix for this issue is in the Community Q&A, please go to this question:

https://developer.appcelerator.com/question/150324/error-in-longjohnjs-when-creating-titanium-project

Best Regards
